content: अभिनव {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [आधिक्येन नवः, भृशार्थे अभिरत्र] {@--1@} ({%a%}) Quite new or fresh (in all senses); पदपंक्तिर्दृश्यतेऽभिनवा <ls>Ś. 3. 8</ls>; <ls n="Ś.">5. 1</ls>; °कंठशोणित <ls n="Ś.">6. 26</ls>; <ls>Me. 98</ls>; <ls>R. 9. 29</ls>; °वा वधूः <ls>K. 2</ls> newly married. ({%b%}) Quite young or fresh, blooming, youthful (as body, age &c.); <ls>Ś. 1. 19</ls>; <ls>U. 5. 12</ls>; the younger; °शाकटायनः; °भोजः &c. ({%c%}) Fresh, recent. {@--2@} Very young, not having experience. --वः [अभिनु अप्] Praise to win over, flattery.
